name: Chef Perfect
description:
The chef wants to find the best of the best ingredients!
But in order to find those, the chef must go through dangerous terrains.
Dash and slice through this 2D platform game.

Made by

  • Lead Designer/Programmer  - Xvyce
  • Lead Artist/Programmer - Grios
  • Artist/Programmer - orbitalrushem4
  • Programmer - Winterprise

This game was made from a school project.
